participant_1.background:
I'm not sure if my parents would approve of my dream to go to Mars.
I can't eat ice cream, but I'll dress up in a costume to celebrate Halloween with my family.
I like to dress well and be well-groomed.
i am 6 foot tall.
I'm not married, but I'm very close with my nieces and nephews.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy making clothing for my loved ones.
I cherish my collection of Celtics memorabilia, but my most valued possession is my garden.
i work in the emergency room.
I've always loved to paint, but I don't think I could do it if I were blind.
i like doing art projects.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing great! How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! What are your hobbies?
I like to make clothing for my loved ones, and I also like to paint.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to paint.
It's not that hard! Just takes some practice.
I bet. I'm not very artistic, so I'm not sure how well I would do.
You could always try taking a class! I took a painting class in college, and it was really fun.
That's a good idea! I'll look into it.
What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse in the emergency room.
Oh, that sounds like a tough job!
It can be, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm not sure I could handle seeing all of that trauma.
It takes a certain kind of person to be a nurse in the ER.
I'm sure it does. I'm just glad there are people like you who are willing to do it.
Thank you! I'm glad I could help.
